title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 177.8 - Access to employees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 177.8 - Access to employees

State Regulations

Division employees shall cooperate with the ombudsman's
investigation. The ombudsman shall interview employees during their regular
hours of employment whenever feasible. When necessary, the facility or program
director, at the request of the ombudsman, may require the employee to make
himself/herself available for an interview. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
177.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
